titles.title: Wounded Warriors Employment Opportunity Act of 2011
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax credit for the employment of wounded warriors.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 11/4/2011--Introduced. Wounded Warriors Employment Opportunity Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $12,000 to $24,000 in taxable years ending before January 1, 2017, the amount of wages which may be taken into account in determining the allowable work opportunity tax credit for the hiring of certain disabled veterans who have been unemployed for six months or more during the one-year period ending on the hiring date.
